title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Create a comprehensive document outlining the project's objectives, features, technical requirements, and user stories. This document should also include performance benchmarks, scalability goals, and security considerations.

title: Architecture Design for Distributed Virtual Reality Environment
description: Design a scalable and efficient architecture capable of handling thousands of users simultaneously.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for creating, modifying, and interacting with the virtual reality environments.
dependencies: Architecture Design for Distributed Virtual Reality Environment

title: Develop Backend Services for Environment Management
description: Create backend services responsible for managing the state of virtual reality environments across multiple users.
dependencies: Architecture Design for Distributed Virtual Reality Environment

title: Implement Database Structure and Queries
description: Design and implement a database structure capable of handling the required data and efficient querying.
dependencies: Architecture Design for Distributed Virtual Reality Environment

title: Set Up Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment Pipeline
description: Implement a CI/CD pipeline to automate testing, building, and deployment processes.
dependencies: Architecture Design for Distributed Virtual Reality Environment

title: Perform Unit and Integration Testing
description: Test individual components and their integration to ensure functionality, scalability, and performance.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Develop Backend Services for Environment Management
Set Up Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment Pipeline

title: Document Project Architecture, Design Decisions, and Best Practices
description: Write clear documentation outlining the project's architecture, design decisions, and best practices for future developers.
dependencies: Architecture Design for Distributed Virtual Reality Environment
